General.Name: Zhejiang Huada New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Huada New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of multi-functional color coated, hot-dip galvanized aluminum sheets, and related substrates in China. The company exports to East China, Southeast Asia, South Asia, West Asia, Eastern Europe, South America, and other countries. It serves construction, home appliances, automobiles, and other industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Zhejiang Huada New Materials Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Huada Group Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: Hangzhou Fuyang Dayuan Industrial Zone, Hangzhou, China, 311413
